expressions.name: parentToNextSelectedLayer
expressions.documentation:
Automatically parent the selected layers to the ones selected after, **in the order of selection** (the last selected one won't have any parent, and will be the higher parent in the layers' hierarchy).
Allows you to create parent/child links chains in a breath !

expressions.name: createRVprojectHierarchy
expressions.documentation: Maintenir SHIFT en cliquant sur le `*aep` bouton dans la MoCode Toolbar permet d'ouvrir une pop-up box permettant de sélectionner uniquement les subfolders souhaités pour chaque extension.

expressions.name: check if OS Is Mac
cond ForLoop
expressions.documentation: A simple `for` Loop

expressions.name: cond If/ElseIf/Else
expressions.documentation:
A simple `else if` condition where `condition1` and `condition2` could be some tests that compare some variables with some values (with the help of comparison operators : `==` `!=` `>=`  and `<=`)

Multilple conditions can be written inside the parenthesis thanks to these 2 useful other operators :

`&&` (condition1a  AND  condition1b)
`||` (condition1a  OR  condition1b)

expressions.name: cond Switch
expressions.documentation: A simple `switch` condition

expressions.name: cond TryCatch
expressions.documentation: A simple `try{}catch(e){}` condition

expressions.name: func applyPreset
expressions.documentation: Applies a preset (`myPreset.ffx`) located in a specified path to a choosen layer (here called `myLayer`)

expressions.name: func createNewComp
expressions.documentation:
Create a new composition in the active AfterEffect project, with the ***name, width, height, length, rate*** and ***background color*** specified with the corresponding arguments.

Returns the new comp itself (can be re-usable in a variable outside the function)

expressions.name: func detectKeys
expressions.documentation:
A function that listens if the user holds down `ALT`, `SHIFT` or `ALT+SHIFT`  on the keyboard,

In order to to change the behavior of a clicked component accordingly, just use the `use detectKeys` depending snippet

expressions.code:
require("createNewComp");
createNewComp('myNewCompName',1920,1080,10,25,[0, 0, 0])
expressions.name: use createNewComp
expressions.documentation:
Create a new composition in the active AfterEffect project, with the* ***name, width, height, length, rate*** and ***background color*** specified with the corresponding arguments.

Requires the `createNewComp` function (also available as a separated snippet)

expressions.name: use detectKeys
expressions.documentation:
Allows you to change the behavior of a clicked UI component like a button, according to which key on the keyboard (`SHIFT`, `ALT`or both) have been pressed by the user.

Requires the function called "func detectKeys" (also available as a separated snippet)

expressions.code: var activeComp = app.project.activeItem;
expressions.name: var activeComp
expressions.documentation: The active composition

expressions.code:
require("activeComp")
var compLayers = myComp.selectedLayers;
expressions.name: var selectedLayers
expressions.documentation: An Array containing all the layers selected in their respecive order

expressions.name: Check Object Prototype Integrity
Clean Object Prototype
Find demoniac script
expressions.documentation: Run all scripts inside a folder (not in subfolders) to check if one or several of them have edited the Object prototype
